name: TXXX
description:
You're running out of time.
It was just a stop on your way, why'd you have to complicate things?
You shouldn't have stayed in the first place…
***
A bittersweet one-shot set in the world of Quaint.
Less than 1000 words.
Made in six days for the O2A2 2022 Visual Novel Jam.
Download for best performance.
